_comment: Claude Code Audio Hooks - Default Configuration Template
_description: This file contains the default configuration for Claude Code Audio Hooks. Copy this to user_preferences.json and customize as needed.

enabled_hooks._comment_notification: ‚úÖ ENABLED - Plays when Claude needs authorization ('Do you want to proceed?')
enabled_hooks._comment_stop: ‚úÖ ENABLED - Plays when Claude finishes responding
enabled_hooks._comment_pretooluse: ‚ùå DISABLED - Would play before EVERY tool execution (too frequent)
enabled_hooks._comment_posttooluse: ‚ùå DISABLED - Would play after EVERY tool execution (too frequent)
enabled_hooks._comment_userpromptsubmit: ‚ùå DISABLED - Would play when you submit a prompt (not needed)

audio_files._comment: Paths relative to audio/ directory. Use 'default/' for built-in files or 'custom/' for your own.

playback_settings._comment_queue: Enable audio queue to prevent overlapping sounds
playback_settings._comment_max_queue: Maximum number of audio notifications in queue
playback_settings._comment_debounce: Minimum milliseconds between same notification type (prevents spam)

_usage_notes: ‚úÖ OPTIMAL CONFIGURATION - 3 Essential Hooks Enabled
This is the RECOMMENDED configuration for the project's core mission:
"Alert user whenever Claude Code stops or pauses for ANY reason"
ENABLED HOOKS (3 total):
1. ‚ö†Ô∏è Notification Hook ‚Üí 'Attention! Authorization needed'
- Triggers when Claude shows 'Do you want to proceed?' prompts
- THIS IS THE KEY HOOK for permission/authorization alerts
- Audio: notification-urgent.mp3
2. ‚úÖ Stop Hook ‚Üí 'Task completed successfully'
- Triggers when Claude finishes responding
- Lets you know when Claude is done working
- Audio: task-complete.mp3
3. ü§ñ SubagentStop Hook ‚Üí 'Subagent task completed'
- Triggers when background/long-running tasks complete
- Important for Task tool operations
- Audio: subagent-complete.mp3
DISABLED HOOKS (6 total) - Not needed for core functionality:
‚ùå PreToolUse - Would play before EVERY tool (Read, Write, Edit, Bash, etc.)
Too noisy! Not needed since Notification hook already handles permission prompts.
‚ùå PostToolUse - Would play after EVERY tool execution
Extremely noisy during development. Not needed for pause/stop detection.
‚ùå UserPromptSubmit - Would play when you press Enter
Unnecessary confirmation. You already know when you submit a prompt.
‚ùå PreCompact, SessionStart, SessionEnd - Rare events, not critical
WHY THIS CONFIGURATION IS OPTIMAL:
- ‚úÖ You hear audio when Claude needs your confirmation (Notification)
- ‚úÖ You hear audio when Claude finishes tasks (Stop)
- ‚úÖ You hear audio when background tasks complete (SubagentStop)
- ‚úÖ Clean and non-intrusive - only alerts when truly needed
- ‚ùå No spam from every tool execution
VERIFIED BEHAVIOR:
When Claude shows 'Do you want to proceed?', Notification hook triggers
and plays notification-urgent.mp3. This is the correct behavior!
Run 'scripts/view-hook-log.sh' to monitor hook triggers in real-time.
